docs.snippet: The police widened their search yesterday for Richard Van Wyck Thorne of 150 Broadway, who disappeared on Dec. 16 and who is now wanted by the District Attorney to explain certain alleged irregularities in connection with fraudulent mortgages. A...
docs.lead_paragraph: The police widened their search yesterday for Richard Van Wyck Thorne of 150 Broadway, who disappeared on Dec. 16 and who is now wanted by the District Attorney to explain certain alleged irregularities in connection with fraudulent mortgages. A charge of forgery has been made against Mr. Thorne by Gilbert A. Montague, a lawyer, of 40 Wall Street.
docs.abstract: exports for week and figures for exports to South Amer. for Oct. compared with those for corresponding month in 1914

headline.main: SAYS TIDE FAVORS COLONEL.; Chicago Newspaper Man Declares Wall St. Wants Roosevelt Named.
